titles.title: Recognizing the 150th anniversary of the birth of General John J. Pershing, an American military hero.
Recognizing the 150th anniversary of the birth of General John J. Pershing, an American military hero.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the 150th anniversary of the birth of General John J. Pershing.
Extends the appreciation of a most grateful nation for his service to the United States.
